mapper.select: SELECT stylistName, stylistPhoto FROM tb_stylist WHERE stylistId IN (SELECT stylistId FROM tb_user_stylist where userId = #{userId});
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_stylist(stylistName, realName, stylistPassword, stylistSex, stylistAge, stylistPhone, stylistStatus, stylistAdvisory) VALUES (#{stylistName}, #{realName}, #{stylistPassword}, #{stylistSex}, #{stylistAge}, #{stylistPhone}, 0, 0);
